data: In Association with GLOCAL'S 20UNDER20 Glocal’s 20 under 20 is an umbrella title for 20 early change makers, who are teenagers from diverse fields, stepping out to create an impact in the society. Glocal is dedicated in recognizing these teenager’s initiative, achievement naming 20 Under 20. These 20 youths below 20 years of age are the game-changers who have done something worth an inspiration in their life. Glocal’s ‘20 under 20’ aims to recognize these enthusiastic young souls who have the vision to do something ordinary in the most extra-ordinary way possible. We believe in their dreams and want to acknowledge these diverse talents who hold the potential to be the change-makers and the future leaders. 20under20 2017 20under20 2018 20under20 2019 20under20 2020 Meet the Early Changemakers 2021 Mr. Aabiskar Thapa Kshetri 19, Pyuthan Engineering Enthusiast Mr. Aaditya Singh Thapa 17, Banke Child Right Activist Mr. Amrit Rijal 19, Sunsari Child Right Activist Ms. Anugraha Ghale 19, Lalitpur Entrepreneur Mr. Anurag Chapagain 18, Nawalparasi YouTuber Mr. Deepak Sutihar 19, Saptari Social Entrepreneur Mr. Gobind Pajiyar 17, Siraha Entrepreneur Mr. Johnson Subedi 18, Parbat Technopreneur Ms. Jwala Dhakal 18, Jhapa Writer Ms. Khusbu Bhandari 18, Chitwan Wildlife Conservationist Mr. Mohan Budha 18, Humla Social Activist Ms. Neha Gurung 19, Kathmandu Social Activist Mr. Om Prakash Wasti 19, Kailali Social Activist Mr. Pranjal Chalise 19, Kathmandu Technopreneur Mr. Reyan Kumar Sapkota 19, Bhaktapur Social Entrepreneur Ms. Sabhya Rai 19, Ilam Education Activist Ms. Sabina Shakya 19, Lalitpur Environmentalist Mr. Shubham Jha 18, Mahottari Aspiring Filmmaker Mr. Suraj Sapkota 19, Nawalparasi Social Activist Mr. Suyog Vardan Acharya 14, Kaski Innovator Partners Throughout the year, Glocal’s 20 under 20 shall work cohesively for identification of opportunity, fostering networking and collaboration and doing works to create an impact in the society. They are expected to use their existing knowledge and experience to initiate works and enhance their leadership and other qualities. Also, paving their way towards becoming future leaders by being interactive and proactive.
